case_circumstances: Highway workers found the victim lying in wooded are on the east side of I-95 N of Doswell, Hanover County VA.  The decedent likely of South American origin had been shot; personal effects are distinctive. Reconstructiion and facial sketch available.
case_eye_description: Eye color is likely brown given Hispanic heritage
case_clothing_on_body: White ski sweater with gray and red horizontal band across the mid chest over a green t-shirt bearing the legend "Someone went to Florida and all I got was a lousy T-shirt;  brief underwear
case_footwear: New tan cowboy boots and brown support socks
case_jewelry: Gold crucifix with attached corpus on a chain necklace, Wedding band with inscription 4-14-75 Lucy  TJ1 18k.  Ring shows 3 thin circumferential grooves with a pattern of cross hatching grooves 1/8" apart.  Seiko wrist watch with days of the week in Spanish. Day of the week reads Dom
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
